> The diff coverage is `100%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20703/graphs/tree.svg?height=150&width=650&src=pr&token=eZ4WkYLtcO)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20703?src=pr&el=tree)

```diff
==========================================

==========================================

  Lines       49277    49279       +2     
==========================================
  Hits        45257    45257              
- Misses       4020     4022       +2
```

|---|---|---|

| [pandas/util/testing.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20703/diff?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL3V0aWwvdGVzdGluZy5weQ==) | `84.38% <0%> (-0.21%)` | :arrow_down: |

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20703?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [d5d5a71...c61dd9a](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20703?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).
thanks @toobaz I closed the issue, but I suppose can revisit a re-factorting of unstack and/or cythonize removing unused levels at some point.
